mapper.insert: insert into forum_comments(user_id, forum_id, ancestor_comment_id, parent_comment_id, content, create_time, update_time) values(#{userId}, #{forumId}, #{ancestorCommentId}, #{parentCommentId}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select fc.comment_id, u.user_id, u.username, u.avatar, fc.ancestor_comment_id, null as parent_user_id, null as parent_username, null as parent_avatar, fc.like_count, fc.comment_count, fc.create_time from forum_comments fc join users u on fc.user_id = u.user_id where fc.forum_id = #{forumId} and fc.state = 'Readable' and fc.parent_comment_id is null order by fc.like_count desc, fc.comment_count desc, fc.create_time desc limit #{offset}, #{size}

select sc.comment_id, su.user_id, su.username, su.avatar, sc.ancestor_comment_id , pu.user_id as parent_user_id, pu.username as parent_username, pu.avatar as parent_avatar, sc.like_count, sc.comment_count, sc.create_time from forum_comments sc join forum_comments pc on sc.parent_comment_id = pc.comment_id join users su on sc.user_id = su.user_id join users pu on pc.user_id = pu.user_id where sc.ancestor_comment_id = #{ancestorCommentId} and sc.forum_id = #{forumId} and sc.state = 'Readable' order by sc.like_count desc, sc.comment_count desc, sc.create_time desc limit #{offset}, #{size}
mapper.insert: insert into forum_likes(comment_id, user_id, create_time) values(#{commentId}, #{userId}, #{createTime})
mapper.delete: delete from forum_likes where comment_id = #{commentId} and user_id = #{userId};
